review: I bought my Chromecast at launch in July 2013, and it's still going strong 2 years later.I mostly use it for Netflix and YouTube. The list of supported apps keeps growing.The genius of this device is its simplicity. Since it's basically a dumb, cheap dongle, it's very flexible. Software developers are adding support for new apps all the time. In addition, you can mirror the screen of some recent Android phones to your TV -- this works very well with my Galaxy Note 4 and Lollipop.
